Summary Note:
The Relationship Manager (RM) first met Binder Graf Gruber at a charity gala in Vienna. They had a long conversation about their mutual interest in philanthropy and decided to stay in touch.
Binder Graf Gruber is a seasoned professional with over 29 years of experience.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Binder Graf Gruber is currently widowed. His children are named Luisa, Beatrix and Koller.
Education Background:
Binder completed his secondary education at Privatgymnasium der Dominikanerinnen in 1992.
After that, he went on to study at Academy of Fine Arts Vienna until 1997.
Occupation History:
Binder Graf Gruber is a seasoned professional with over 29 years of experience.
Binder Graf Gruber's first role was as a Journalist at News Networld Media GmbH, where he worked diligently from 1996 to 1997 to establish a strong reputation.
His subsequent role was as a Editor at News Networld Media GmbH, where he continued to grow professionally from 1998 to 2000.
His tenure as a Publisher at ORF (Austrian Broadcasting Corporation) from 2001 to 2002 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
In 2004, he transitioned to ORF (Austrian Broadcasting Corporation) to take on the position of TV/Radio Host, capitalizing on his expertise to propel business growth.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 870000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He owns condo in Amstetten, where he resides. It is worth 767000 EUR.

He purchased house in Wels, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 853000 EUR.

In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 200000 EUR from his late grandfather, a renowned Stock Trader, in 2009.
Client Summary: In conclusion, we are confident in the client's financial stability and future prospects.
